attributes.action: change the local earnings factor used in the Social Housing Rent Restructuring formula from gross earnings to net take-home pay, in order to address affordability issues.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Government currently bases its calculation of what social housing tenants should pay in rent partly on "gross pay". This doesn't take account of income tax, national insurance, or pension costs and so is too blunt a tool to make sure that rents are affordable for all.
